specialist.title: Specialist
descriptions: Advise our customers on product selection and solve their technical problems
Optimized the team’sWorkflow with an Apple Shortcut
Trained new employees,e.g. through role-playing customer scenarios
Pursued additional skills through Coursera courses,e.g. Pricing
